original_text: In the morning sow thy seed, and in the evening withhold not thine hand: for thou knowest not whether shall prosper, either this or that, or whether they both shall be alike good.
korean_text: 너는 아침에 씨를 뿌리고 저녁에도 손을 놓지 말라 이것이 잘 될는지, 저것이 잘 될는지, 혹 둘이 다 잘 될는지 알지 못함이니라

sentences.original_text: In the morning sow thy seed
and in the evening withhold not thine hand
whether shall prosper, either this or that
or whether they both shall be alike good
